naslov: NOVO renovirana Villa sa 3 stana - 50 m od mora (prodaja)
opis: Molimo nazovite na br. +385981953463 . Hvala Svega 6 km od Trogira, blizu obale malog živopisnog mjesta nalazi se predivna Villa, nedavno renovirana  u mediteranskom stilu, vrhunsko kvalitetnim, za ovo podneblje tipičnim materijalima (drvo - kamen). Villa sadrži tri komforna 2 - sobna apartmana, potpuno opremljena novim, neo-klasičnim namještajem i uređajima. Svaki se stan sastoji od dnevnog boravka sa kuhinjom i trpezarijom, spavaće sobe, kupatila i ostave i pripadajućeg balkona i/ili terase odakle se pruža idiličan pogled na okolni akvatorij - poluotok Vinišće, otok Čiovo i Marinski zaljev. U prizemlju se nalazi garaža, a na ulaznom dijelu sa lijeve i desne strane se mogu parkirati još 4 vozila. Pokrenut je postupak formiranja nove, susjedne parcele , od cca 400m2, na kojoj se trenutno nalazi uređen vrt u kojem rastu masline i razno  mediteransko bilje, organiziran u nekoliko kaskadnih terasa, opremljenih ležaljkama i vanjskim tuševima, barom i roštiljem. a koja če se moći dodatno kupiti uz parcelu s kućom. Osigurana sva pravna, logistička i stručna usluga. Ostale informacije na upit: mob: +385 98 195 3463 mail: split@kvadar-nekretnine.hr www.kvadar-nekretnine.hr Hvala ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- NEWLY renovated Villa with 3 apartments - 50 m from the sea Please call on no. +385981953463. Thank you Only 6 km from Trogir, close to the shore of a small picturesque place, is a beautiful Villa,  recently renovated  in Mediterranean style, top quality, with typical materials for this area (wood - stone). Villa has three comfortable 2-room apartments, fully equipped with new, neoclassic furniture and appliances. Each apartment consists of living room with kitchen and dining room, bedroom, bathroom and storage space and has a balcony and / or a terrace with an idyllic view of the surrounding aquatorium - the Vinišće peninsula, the island of Ciovo and the bay of Marina. On the ground floor there is a garage, and at the entrance part on the left and right side can be parked another 4 vehicles. The process of forming a new, neighboring plot of approximately 400m2 has been initiated, on which there is currently a landscaped garden with olive trees and various Mediterranean plants, organized into several cascading terraces, equipped with deck chairs and outdoor showers, a bar and a barbecue. which will be available for purchase in addition to the plot with the house. All legal, logistical and professional services are provided. Other information on request: mob: +385 98 195 3463 mail: split@kvadar-nekretnine.hr www.kvadar-nekretnine.hr Thank you
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Grijalice i radijatori na struju
